name: Super Bomberman 4
description:
Super Bomberman 4 is an action-puzzle game developed by Hudson Soft. It was originally released in 1996. It was published by HUDSON SOFT. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Super Bomberman 4 on SNES.
It was produced by Tadashi Ozaki. Shinji Imada and Shinsuke Fujiwara directed the game. Jun Chikuma scored the game.
